MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the CW5 postcode area of Nantwich, affecting properties in Wrenbury and surrounding area. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. So far we have identified an underground cable fault and are arranging for generators to be taken to site and we now expect your supply to be restored by 6:30am. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:35am on 8th January
